user_query: I'm planning a dinner date and I want to find a restaurant in the Wyre area with a good hygiene rating. Can you suggest some options and provide their contact information? Additionally, I would like to know the hygiene rating and address of the Shovels Inn.

TaskList.description: Search for restaurants in the Wyre area with good hygiene ratings.
Retrieve contact information for the found restaurants.
Fetch the hygiene rating and address for the Shovels Inn.
